patchName: Open Beta 21 - Goddess of Magic Update
summary: Eset ported to SMITE 2. Conquest Map Phases introduced with Moonlight Phase mechanic. Soft Ranked Reset for Conquest. New Moonlight-themed items added. Multiple god balance changes.

description: Ranged Basic Attacks
Damage Type: Magical
Scaling Type: Intelligence Scaling

Whenever a god dies within range of Eset, she gains a stack of Funeral Rites; granting HP5 and MP5 to her and nearby allies. Additionally, every third basic attack from Eset is empowered; allowing it to hit in a wider radius and dealing bonus damage based on her stacks of invocation.
At 5 stacks, Eset's invocation buff can stack up to 5 stacks.
At 10 stacks, Eset's invocation buff can stack up to 6 stacks and Eset gains 10 Cooldown Rate.
Fire 4 projectiles in a line, each dealing magical damage to all targets in their path.
While casting, Eset gains movement speed, reduced backpedal and strafing penalties and gains immunity to knockback and root effects.
Each projectile grants a stack of invocation the first time it hits an enemy.
Sends forth a ball of spirit energy. While it travels, Eset can re-activate the ability to detonate the ball, dealing magical damage and stunning enemies.
The further the ball travels, the higher its damage and stun duration.
When the ball deals damage to enemies, grants a stack of invocation for each enemy hit.
Eset silences and slows enemy gods at her location. Enemy gods hit also lose a portion of their magical protections.
If Eset hits an enemy god, allies near Dispel Magic or Eset gain a shield.
Call down your staff and create a circle of protective magic for 5 seconds before it explodes, dealing magical damage to all enemies and healing all allies in the area.
Eset can re-activate this ability at any time to detonate it, dealing the damage and healing early.
Any damage dealt in the area while active charges the circle, increasing its damage and healing.
While standing in the area, allies take 30% less damage.
Dispel Magic no longer requires an enemy god hit to shield allies and now applies Transference to all allies it shields.
Wing Gust no longer has damage scaling, but applies a movement speed aura to allies, and when its projectiles hit enemies, all allies with transference are healed.
Seismic Crush Stealths you and Slows enemies instead of Stunning.
Refraction Shield stacks energy by dealing damage and deals bonus damage instead of a Stun.
Tremors spawns a vision dealing damage and Slowing on the final hit.
You teleport to a location before casting Tectonic Shift, each Wall having less Health.
Decreased Health Regen: 8/11/14/17/20 -> 6/8/10/12/14
Decreased % Health Damage per tick to minions: 4% -> 3.5%
Decreased Cooldown: 16s -> 16/15.5/15/14.5/14s
Decreased Cooldown: 14/13.5/13/12.5/12s -> 12s
Decreased Cooldown: 90s -> 90/85/80/75/70s
Fixed so this ability correctly only applies the buff to gods
Decreased base Inhand Power: 30 -> 24
Increased Per Level Inhand Power: 3.3 -> 4
Increased Max Health Scaling: 6% -> 8%
This ability now only procs item effects for 50% damage
Fixed an issue where these ranks were non-uniform
Decreased Intelligence Scaling: 75% -> 70%
Decreased Intelligence Scaling: 85% -> 75%
The threshold buffs no longer provide Protections
Decreased Eagle Cooldown reduction: 25% -> 20%
Decreased Strength per Stack: 4 -> 3
Decreased Intelligence per Stack: 6 -> 5
Decreased Strength per Threshold Stack: 10 -> 7
Decreased Intelligence per Threshold Stack: 15 -> 10
Decreased Strength Scaling: 35% -> 30%
Decreased Subsequent Dart Damage: 60% -> 50%

changes.description: During Moonlight Phase: While Stealthed: +15% Movement Speed
Pass through an enemy god: Physical Damage equal to 15% of your Max Health
During Moonlight Phase: Hits enemies around you
During Moonlight Phase: Hit enemies below 50% Health: 1 Stack of 5% Lifesteal (Max 4, lasts 6s)
No The Reaper stacks are lost on death
Adaptive Stat: +35 Strength or +50 Intelligence (based on highest item stat)
On Use: Spawn a Watchful Eye that lasts 30s
Enemy enters range: Fires a seeking projectile: Magical Damage equal to 15% of Enemy Max Health + 25% Slow for 1.5s
During Moonlight Phase: Each time you deal damage to a god: -2s Cooldown of this item (Once per target, per Attack or Ability)
Every 30s: Lowest Health ally within 8.8m gain: +15 Health Regen, +15 Mana Regen, 0.2s off Cooldowns every 0.2s for 4s
During Moonlight Phase: On trigger: You also gain the Buff
On Use: Take 50% Damage for 4s. After: Take Physical Damage equal to mitigated Damage. Cannot drop below 5% Health
During Moonlight Phase: Only 50% of the mitigated Damage is dealt back
Changed Recipe: Survivors Sash + Legionnaire Armor to Survivors Sash + Enraged Guard
Fixed Description: This item was incorrectly listed as having 20% Attack Speed instead of 25%
Passive: This item now has 6 max stacks, each providing 30 Intelligence. Dying causes you to lose 4 stacks.
changes.note: This item no longer reduces Protections with stacks.

description: Conquest now alternates between 'normal' Conquest and a special phase called the Moonlight Phase at regular intervals during the match
The Moonlight Phase features visual changes to the map, plus unique objectives and rewards that only spawn during this phase
Matches start in the normal phase until the 6 minute mark when the map transitions to the Moonlight Phase
The Moonlight Phase lasts for 3 minutes before returning to normal
This cycle repeats until the end of the match
During the Moonlight phase, each team competes to gather Moonlight Shards
For every Shard your team collects, each team member gets +1 Gold at the end of the phase
If you collect more Shards than the enemy team, you'll also spawn a single wave of Naga lane pushers in all 3 lanes
Furthermore, if your team reaches the maximum number of 100 Shards before the phase ends, your team will be rewarded with a consumable item: Ritual of the Full Moon
Each Shard picked up adds +1 to your team's total Moonlight Shard count
Shards can be collected from 3 different sources:
By destroying Moonlight Crystals that spawn during the phase (Drops up to 5 Shards)
By slaying enemy Gods (Grants 5 Shards)
By controlling the Moonlight Ritual site at the center of the map (Drops 1 Shard per second while under your control, or faster with more allied Gods at the site)
On Pickup: Rewards +12 XP and heals for 1.5% Max Health (Shards picked up from the Ritual site do not grant the healing portion)
The number of Shards you personally collect is displayed on the buff bar, and determines the strength of the Ritual of the Full Moon's buff effect
Spawn at various locations across the map at the start of the Moonlight phase
These can be attacked or interacted with to drop up to 5 Shards
Respawn 30 seconds after destroyed
This capture point at the center of the map unlocks 90 seconds into the Moonlight Phase
Gain control over the site by standing in it with no enemy Gods present
While under your control, the Ritual site rains down a constant stream of Moonlight Shards
Spawn with the next minion wave at the end of the Moonlight Phase for the team that collected more Moonlight Shards
The minions in this wave are Champion Minions with +10% Damage Mitigation
Stats (base + per Level scaling every 3 minutes): Max Health: 2000 (+250), Strength: 40 (+8), Physical Protection: 30 (+3), Magical Protection: 20 (+3), XP Reward: 20 (+3), Gold Reward: 10 (+1)
This reward pickup spawns at the Ritual Site for the team that reaches 100 Shards
Can be stolen after 10s
Picking it up grants you the Ritual of the Full Moon consumable item, which can be used to activate a team Ritual effect for 30s
On Consume: For allies: Convert all Shards personally carried by your teammates into a Movement Speed buff for 30s. Grants +5% Movement Speed plus more for each Shard
Reveal all enemy Gods for 5s and summon a Star Strike at their location
Star Strikes deal 0.75% of Max Health per victim's level as Magical Damage after a 0.5s warm-up
Gods hit by Star Strikes are revealed for an additional 5s

changes.description: All others drop a division and a tier
You do not drop below Platinum 3. Anyone below Platinum 3 will see no adjustments
Badges will be awarded for last split's performance

bugFixes.description: Scepter of Dominion targeter visual upgrade

bugFixes.description: Ability 04 fixed to not have galaxy fill and not be total darkness
